channel.title: Dawntained | The RSPS for you!
channel.description:
[CENTER] [URL=http://dawntained.com][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gsHWTQ5.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://dawntained.com/play][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WFfOzNu.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/53909731/Dawntained.jar][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DRd4zuo.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://dawntained.com][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/G8XC68U.png[/img][/URL]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BUVKd7X.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tJDlPER.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kWEhd0a.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kkzJY2u.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ukaGx2s.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DuqzDmc.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JruQFRw.png[/img]
- Active forum
- Friendly community
- Client has many changeable features to fit your needs
- Combat on Dawntained has been perfected
- Switching is smooth and no dragging
- In game highscores for top Player Killers
- Player killing tracker to track Pking statistics
- Nomad will spawn every 2 hours in a random multi area in the Wilderness and Nomad has a likely chance to drop a Pvp item
- 15 bosses to battle for rare drops which include Dagannoth Kings, God Wars Dungeon bosses, Chaos Elemental, Corporeal Beast, Tormented Demon, Ice Strykewyrm, Barrelchest, Jad and King Black Dragon
- Slayer tasks, you are awarded a casket on completion, rewards from the casket can vary from trimmed armour to 3rd age items
- Skilling island with 12 skills to train, where all non-combat skill training belongs
- Completionist cape for maxed players, this cape can also be recoloured and has it's own unique emote
- Achievement points rewarded for each maxed skill achieved to buy rare items
- Money making via skilling
We're starting off fresh. You're all welcome to join~

item.dc:creator: @M_G_T M G T
item.description:
@M_G_T wrote:

I r Pwn u:

Rollbacks will no longer occur, as MGT stated, the issue has been dealt with. Accounts will save every minute to avoid any loss of progress.

Yes, all this has been sorted out fast. More content is planned for this week, the community is really loving this.

  • Active forum

  • Friendly community

  • Client has many changeable features to fit your needs

  • Combat on Dawntained has been perfected

  • Switching is smooth and no dragging

  • In game highscores for top Player Killers

  • Player killing tracker to track Pking statistics

  • Nomad will spawn every 2 hours in a random multi area in the Wilderness and Nomad has a likely chance to drop a Pvp item

  • 15 bosses to battle for rare drops which include Dagannoth Kings, God Wars Dungeon bosses, Chaos
    Elemental, Corporeal Beast, Tormented Demon, Ice Strykewyrm, Barrelchest, Jad and King Black Dragon

  • Slayer tasks, you are awarded a casket on completion, rewards from the casket can vary from trimmed armour to 3rd age items

  • Skilling island with 12 skills to train, where all non-combat skill training belongs

  • Completionist cape for maxed players, this cape can also be recoloured and has it’s own unique emote

  • Achievement points rewarded for each maxed skill achieved to buy rare items

  • Money making via skilling

We’re starting off fresh. You’re all welcome to join~
